Author: cybercapitalinvest
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: Dear crypto community,  We would first like to thank all investors who believe in the concept of Cyber Capital Invest and who have participated in our pre-ICO.  Currently, we are facing a very volatile and unpredictable crypto market. This causes uncertainty among many people and we are aware of this. To give investors more time to acquire CCI tokens, we decided to postpone the main token sale until the market has reached a certain level of stability. After all, CCI was founded to provide investors with security and confidence and in times of an unstable crypto market like this, we feel obliged to wait until we proceed with our ICO.  As soon as we have news regarding our main token sale, we will inform you immediately.  Thank you for your patience.  The CCI team

Author: cryptossi
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: The funds raised on the DAOX protocol for the CCI ICO will be stored on a DAO instead of being held in a bank account and being controlled by one central figure.  The team will need to send in withdrawal requests and provide info on why they are using the funds, the important thing is investors will get to vote on whether they approve these withdrawals and decide when the team uses the funds.  DAOX is the fairest and the most transparent use of the blockchain that I have seen for a long time and fair play to CCI for being extremely brave and being one of the first companies to do this. They have earned a lot more respect from me for doing this.

There is a set of procedures that need to be carried out for example the person submitted an old document or an unclear document...etc So the team follows a set of procedures usually mandated by a lawyer. In short the Anti Fraud Department should be a team dedicated to ensure rules and regulations apply.

Author: cryptossi
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: Well they have four real options:  1. End the token sale and close the project (if you can’t raise the softcap you’re probably going to struggle in business as there clearly isn’t enough demand).  2. Pause token sale, continue working on development, re-start token sale when markets have picked up again.  3. Close token sale and Try to secure private funding from VC’s, angel investors, banks, etc..  4. Try to develop project with funds raised even if they are below softcap level, lower the budget, less workers, etc..  There’s a few different options most projects pick option 2 or 3 because it’s hard to give up something before it’s even started.

Author: cybercapitalinvest
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: We will automatically insure all our Users and that insurance coverage will vary. The values will be based on the type of their account level the user has opted to adopt:      ● Basic Access Level Insured up to $1,000 + 10% profit.      ● Silver Access Level Insured up to $10,000 + 10% profit.      ● Insured deposit of up to $100,000 + 10% profit. Even in the event of a ‘force majeure’ or dramatic currency price dips, our Users will be guaranteed to keep their insured assets. This underwriting will be secured by our reserve scheme. It will be covered by our Reserve Trading Capital and investments made by users.

Author: cybercapitalinvest
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: For instance, $20,000,000 raised on ICO will correspond to 100,000,000 of CCI Tokens sold. Initially, we are going to put 40% of the investments ($8,000,000) into the trading pot and our traders will start to generate profit. Let’s take 10% daily profit as an example, this equates to $800,000 per day made by our professional traders. 30% of this profit which is equal to $240,000 is spread among CCI Token Holders. Now, let’s say an investor has bought 100,000 CCI Tokens, which will guarantee them 0.1% of a total profit share. $240,000*0.001=$240.  This means that the owner of 100,000 CCI Tokens will be getting progressive profit starting at $240 per day.  Please check the Share of Profit section(last page) of our Financial Paper - https://www.cybercapitalinvest.io/documents/CCI%20Financial%20Model.pdf

Author: cybercapitalinvest
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: Cyber Capital Invest is an online investment fund platform, aimed to help people who would like to trade on the cryptocurrency market but can’t due to a lack of experience or skills. Cyber Capital Invest is also aimed to help skillful traders who do not have access to wide asset portfolios. Cyber Capital Invest will thoroughly pick traders to employ and ‘trust’ customers’ assets. The point of CCI Platform is that experienced traders are trading for you. Users will have various Investment plans to choose from. New users can create anonymous accounts where they don’t have to submit any personal identification documentation. This means no identifiable, personal information about that user is stored on our databases.  CCI is also a Profit Share Token which allows you to receive weekly profit from the consistently growing Trading Capital.

Author: cybercapitalinvest
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: Users will be getting their payouts according to the investment plans chosen. 5% of generated profit by the platform will go to Trading Capital increase, 30% will to go Token Holders, 40% to Users and rest will be kept by CCI.

Author: cybercapitalinvest
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: We will automatically insure all our Users and that insurance coverage will vary. The values will be based on the type of their account level the user has opted to adopt. In the event of dramatic currency price dips, our Users will be guaranteed to keep their insured assets. This underwriting will be secured by our reserve scheme. It will be covered by our Reserve Trading Capital and investments made by users.  40% of ICO contributions will be put into Trading Capital. This means that as soon as the platform starts working – it will generate profit on a daily basis. Traders will be working with a large Trading Capital - much larger than it is required to make the profit to fulfill investment plans of CCI Platform users.

Author: cybercapitalinvest
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: New users can create anonymous accounts where they don’t have to submit any personal identification document. This means no identifiable, personal information about that user is stored on our databases, so even in the event of a security breach, the user remains anonymous. This means anonymous deposits and withdrawals. We don’t store our User’s activity data, so there is no risk regarding third-party access. We don’t store user’s location data. In other words, when a user closes their account with us, no personal data is left behind on our databases. The initial idea of cryptocurrency was user privacy. Our team believes that user data must be completely anonymous and secure.

Author: cybercapitalinvest
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: We will provide a range of investment plans offering different lengths of time. Short-term plans offering easy access, and long-term plans with a set active period. Interest rates will differ depending on the plan length and amount invested. Our platform will provide a profit forecast calculator, so before new users pick a plan, they can check the return on investment, based on time period lock-ins. We will also provide a fully flexible investment plan, whereby the original investment + profit may be held in the system for as long as the user wants, and will be fully available for withdrawal after 24 hours.  You can already check CCI team traders' Cryptocompare portfolios on our website in the team section. The team will be expanding with experienced and high-class professional traders.

Author: cybercapitalinvest
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: We will automatically insure all our Users and that insurance coverage will vary. The values will be based on the type of their account level the user has opted to adopt:  - Basic Access Level Insured up to $1,000 + 10% profit. - Silver Access Level Insured up to $10,000 + 10% profit. - Insured deposit of up to $100,000 + 10% profit.  Even in the event of a ‘force majeure’ or dramatic currency price dips, our Users will be guaranteed to keep their insured assets. This underwriting will be secured by our reserve scheme. It will be covered by our Reserve Trading Capital and investments made by users.

It will be covered by our Reserve Trading Capital and investments made by users.

Author: cybercapitalinvest
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: 40% of ICO contributions will be allocated directly into Trading Capital. This reserve capital is vital to the business. It serves to: - Underwrite the customer's insurance policies and thus, will be subject to independent auditing on a quarterly basis. The Audit Results will be published in the Public domain. - Act as the financial guarantor for delivering all fixed profit margins laid out in the Investment Plans for Users. - Deliver healthy profit share to Token Holders. So it is essential, prior to the platform being open to Users, the Traders begin utilizing the Reserve Fund to build up profits and more capital.

Author: cybercapitalinvest
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: Hello. This is how the accumulated profit will be distributed: - Shareholders (CCI Token holders) - 30% - Platform users - 40% - The increase of trading capital - 5% - Team - 25%

Author: cybercapitalinvest
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: Employed crypto traders to work with CCI Trading Capital will be of high-class professional standard. Traders will be working with a large Trading Capital - much larger than it is required to make the profit to fulfil investment plans of CCI Platform users. 40% of ICO contributions will be put into Trading Capital. This means that as soon as the platform starts working – it will generate profit on a daily basis.  We will automatically insure all our Users and that insurance coverage will vary. The values will be based on the type of their account level. Even in the event of a dramatic currency price dips, our Users will be guaranteed to keep their insured assets. This underwriting will be secured by our reserve scheme. It will be covered by our Reserve Trading Capital and investments made by users.

Author: cybercapitalinvest
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: As a CCI User, you will be able to choose different investments plans, interest rates will differ depending on the plan length and amount invested.  As a CCI Token Holder, you will be getting a progressive profit, the % depends on the amount of CCI Tokens you own.  For instance, $20,000,000 raised on ICO will correspond to 100,000,000 of CCI Tokens sold. Initially, we are going to put 40% of the investments ($8,000,000) into the trading pot and our traders will start to generate profit. Let’s take 10% daily profit as an example, this equates to $800,000 per day made by our professional traders. 30% of this profit which is equal to $240,000 is spread among CCI Token Holders.  Now, let’s say an investor has bought 100,000 CCI Tokens, which will guarantee them 0.1% of a total profit share. $240,000*0.001=$240.  This means that the owner of 100,000 CCI Tokens will be getting progressive profit starting at $240 per day.

Author: cybercapitalinvest
Title: [ANN] [ICO] [CCI] - CYBER CAPITAL INVEST - Cryptocurrency Investment Fund
Body: 40% of ICO contributions will be put into Trading Capital. This means that as soon as the platform starts working – it will generate profit on a daily basis. This profit will split into 3 sections – Increase of trading capital, Shareholders, Team. Employed crypto traders to work with CCI Trading Capital will be of high class professional standard. Traders will be working with a large Trading Capital - much larger than it is required to make profit to fulfil investment plans of CCI Platform users.  We will automatically insure all our Users and that insurance cover will vary, valuewise, based on the type of their account level the user has opted to adopt:  Basic Access Level Insured up to $1,000 + 10% profit. Silver Access Level Insured up to $10,000 + 10% profit. Gold Access Level Insured deposit of up to $100,000 + 10% profit.  Even in the event of a ‘force majeure’ or dramatic currency price dips, our Users will be guaranteed to keep their insured assets. This underwriting will be secured by our reserve scheme. It will be covered by our Reserve Trading Capital and investments made by users.
